metadata.title: ML & Full-Stack Developer Portfolio
metadata.description: Portfolio of an ML and full-stack developer building production-ready web apps, APIs, mobile apps, analytics dashboards, and AI-powered systems.

hero.headline: I am Eng Moscab Bashir Hassan, an ML and Full-Stack Developer building modern digital products.
hero.subheadline: I design and build ML-powered web and mobile systems with Next.js/React, Python/FastAPI, Node.js, PHP, and SQL databases for real business workflows.

about.title: Practical ML + full-stack engineering for real operations
about.description: I design and build production systems that combine modern frontend, backend APIs, databases, and ML/AI features for real teams and organizations.

skills.description: A practical toolkit across frontend, APIs, databases, cloud, and ML integration.
